snippet: Dozens more Lebanese soldiers were captured in an armed offensive by Islamist fighters, the country’s army chief said, in the most recent spillover from the civil war in neighboring Syria.
abstract: Islamist fighters from Syria kill 10 Lebanese fighters and appear to capture over dozen others in armed battle for control of Lebanese border town of Arsal.

byline.contributor: Ben Hubbard contributed reporting from Gaza.

lead_paragraph: Dozens more Lebanese soldiers were captured in an armed offensive by Islamist fighters, the country’s army chief said, in the most recent spillover from the civil war in neighboring Syria.

headline.main: Fighters From Syria Kill 10 Lebanese Soldiers in Battle Over Border Town
headline.print_headline: 10 Lebanese Soldiers Killed in Spillover From Syria

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
